South Side Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A south side delegation with Jin Tong Su, vice-minister of Finance and Economy, as its chief delegate arrived here to attend the 13th meeting of the North-South Committee for the Promotion of Economic Cooperation on Wednesday.
